weekly_top_story.headline: Pakistani forces end 40-hour counterterrorism operation against Baloch Liberation Army, killing 145 insurgents amid accusations of Indian backing
weekly_top_story.summary: The operation in Balochistan resulted in significant casualties on all sides and heightened India-Pakistan tensions, potentially destabilizing regional security and complicating counterinsurgency efforts in South Asia.

stories.headline: Russian lieutenant general shot by assailant in Moscow, investigators say
stories.summary: The assassination attempt on a high-ranking Russian military officer in the capital raises concerns over internal security threats and potential instability amid the ongoing Russo-Ukrainian war.

stories.headline: Iran and US to reopen nuclear talks in Oman after weeks of tension
stories.summary: The resumption of talks with the US demanding zero nuclear capability from Iran could ease escalating tensions but risks failure given historical mistrust, affecting global non-proliferation efforts.
